title: The Heart of Tsukuyomi
overview: The Heart of Tsukuyomi follows a young man grappling with mysterious phenomena, possibly hallucinations, tied to the moon god Tsukuyomi. He confronts past traumas, including the loss of a loved one, while forming a deep emotional bond with another character. The story follows the emotional entanglement between the male protagonist, Lu Zixuan, and Su Qing, sparked by a chance encounter through literature. Lu Zixuan possesses a special ability called "Moon Reading," which allows him to glimpse into others'…
